subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
Officiating (Sports)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Before his team’s match with Belgium, Jurgen Klinsmann, the United States’ coach, expressed a bit of unease about the French-speaking referee slated to officiate the game.
snippet: Before his team’s match with Belgium, Jurgen Klinsmann, the United States’ coach, expressed a bit of unease about the French-speaking referee slated to officiate the game.
